Posts.EditableText:
This allows you to set the parser to recognize your pronoun as the item.

```
function setPronoun(item){
	var { subjective : pronoun } = item.pronouns
	parser.pronouns[pronoun] = item
	return pronoun
}
```
Posts.HTML:
This allows you to set the parser to recognize your pronoun as the item.

function setPronoun(item){
	var { subjective : pronoun } = item.pronouns
	parser.pronouns[pronoun] = item
	return pronoun
}
